timeline.bodyText: Please keep the original methods for backward compatibility and delegate to the new filterByTerm(TermFilter) method.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: These can be removed, since they were basically unused so far.
timeline.author: cmark
cmark

timeline.bodyText: There are no validations present on the minShouldMatch field. It should be greater than or equal to 1, otherwise throw a BadRequestException.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: It is not entirely certain, that a tooling plugin has these exact fields and namings on its term field. Also, there might be other fields that should participate in the term filter process by using the same semantics. I would handle this per search request implementation as opposed to handling it locally in this class' evaluateOnField(String) method.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: parsedTerm is another specific TermFilter type, please add it to the implementation.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Please keep the original feature intact and add an extractor to extract the term value for the special option key handler.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Trim the incoming term and remove custom trimming from all concrete search request implementations.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: A Valid annotation might be required to evaluate these annotations, please write a test case for this.
timeline.author: cmark

+

+ * Represents a {@link Serializable} encapsulation of term search configuration.

+ */
+public final class TermFilter implements Serializable {
+
+	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
+	
+	@NotNull

+
